foods.name: Classic Cheeseburger
foods.description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles on a sesame seed bun.

foods.name: Pepperoni Pizza
foods.description: A crispy crust topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and slices of spicy pepperoni.

foods.name: Beef Taco
foods.description: A soft corn tortilla filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomato, and shredded cheese.
